install.name: List Module for VideoFlow
install.author: Kirungi Fred Fideri
install.copyright: All rights reserved by Kirungi Fred Fideri/Fidsoft 2010.
install.description: List Module for VideoFlow - Displays categories, latest, popular, featured, highest rated or random VideoFlow media. It can be published on your Joomla site or Facebook application.

param.name: modloc
param.label: Module location
param.description: Select where you are publishing the module

param.name: daycount
param.label: Popular this week period
param.description: Number of days to consider when computing 'Popular this Week'.

param.name: cats
param.label: Categories
param.description: Media categories to show, separated by comma, eg: '1,7,5'. Leave blank for all categories.

param.name: vfcolumns
param.label: Column count
param.description: Number of columns. For perfect look, media count must be multiple of column count. Eg, for 4 columns, set media count at 4, 8, 12, etc.

param.name: listlimit
param.label: Media file count
param.description: Number of media files to list.

param.name: seemore
param.label: Show 'See More' link
param.description: Display 'See More' link at end of list?

param.name: ltextc
param.label: Label text colour
param.description: Leave blank for default colour.

param.name: ltexts
param.label: Label text size
param.description: Enter percentage value.

param.name: lbgroundc
param.label: Label background colour
param.description: Leave blank for transparent

param.name: lborders
param.label: Label border size
param.description: Enter '0' or leave blank for no border.

param.name: lborderc
param.label: Label border colour
param.description: Leave blank for default colour.

param.name: titlepos
param.label: Title position
param.description: Title display options.

param.name: titlelength
param.label: Title length
param.description: Media title length.

param.name: texts
param.label: Title text size
param.description: Enter percentage value. Leave blank for default size.

param.name: thumbwidth
param.label: Thumbnail width
param.description: Width in pixels.

param.name: thumbheight
param.label: Thumbnail height
param.description: Height in pixels.

param.name: jeffects
param.label: URL to Javascript effects file
param.description: Leave blank for no javascript effects.

param.name: jeffectsclass
param.label: Javascript effects class
param.description: Leave blank for no javascript effects.

param.name: iborders
param.label: Thumbnail border size
param.description: Enter '0' for no border.

param.name: iborderc
param.label: Thumbnail border colour
param.description: Leave blank for default colour.

param.name: lightboxmode
param.label: Lightbox mode
param.description: In Dual mode, thumbnail links open in lightbox and text links open normally. In Full mode, all media links open in lightbox.

param.name: lboxh
param.label: Lightbox height offset
param.description: Adjusts size of lightbox popup window.

param.name: lboxw
param.label: Lightbox width offset
param.description: Ajusts width of lightbox popup window.

param.name: bgroundc
param.label: Module background colour
param.description: Leave blank for transparent.

param.name: borders
param.label: Module border size
param.description: Enter '0' for no border.

param.name: borderc
param.label: Module border colour
param.description: Leave blank for default colour.
